mapper.insert: insert into users (id, pw, nick, name, birth, phone, email, role) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nick}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{role})
mapper.select: select * from users where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw} select * from users where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw} and status='active'
mapper.delete: delete from users where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update users set status=#{status} where id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select u.id, u.name, u.reg, u.role, r.category from users u join reporter r on u.id = r.id where u.role = 'reporter'
mapper.update: update reporter set category=#{category} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, pw, nick, name, birth, phone, email, status, role, reg from users where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update users set nick = #{nick, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id}
